001package eu.andredick.tools;
002
003import org.knowm.xchart.SwingWrapper;
004import org.knowm.xchart.VectorGraphicsEncoder;
005import org.knowm.xchart.XYChart;
006import org.knowm.xchart.XYSeries;
007import org.knowm.xchart.style.MatlabTheme;
008import org.knowm.xchart.style.Styler;
009import org.knowm.xchart.style.markers.SeriesMarkers;
010
011import java.io.File;
012import java.io.IOException;
013import java.util.List;
014
015/**
016 * 图表工具类<br>
017 */
018public class ChartTools {
019
020    private XYChart chart;
021
022    public ChartTools(String title, String xAxisTitle, String yAxisTitle) {
023        int width = 600;
024        int height = 350;
025        this.chart = new XYChart(width, height);
026        if (title != null) this.chart.setTitle(title);
027        this.chart.setXAxisTitle(xAxisTitle);
028        this.chart.setYAxisTitle(yAxisTitle);
029
030        chart.getStyler().setTheme(new MatlabTheme());
031        chart.getStyler().setAxisTitlesVisible(true);
032        chart.getStyler().setDefaultSeriesRenderStyle(XYSeries.XYSeriesRenderStyle.Line);
033        chart.getStyler().setLegendPosition(Styler.LegendPosition.InsideNE);
034
035        //chart.getStyler().setYAxisMin(150.);
036        //chart.getStyler().setYAxisMax(550.);
037
038        new SwingWrapper(chart).displayChart();
039    }
040
041
042    public void addDataSeries(String name, float[] yData) {
043
044        double[] doubleArray = new double[yData.length];
045        for (int i = 0; i < doubleArray.length; i++) {
046            doubleArray[i] = yData[i];
047        }
048
049        XYSeries series1 = chart.addSeries(name, null, doubleArray);
050        series1.setMarker(SeriesMarkers.NONE);
051        series1.setLineWidth(1.2f);
052    }
053
054
055    public void updateDataSeries(String name, List<Float> yData) {
056        XYSeries series1 = chart.updateXYSeries(name, null, yData, null);
057    }
058
059    public void saveChartAsSVG(File file) {
060        try {
061            VectorGraphicsEncoder.saveVectorGraphic(chart, file.getCanonicalPath(), VectorGraphicsEncoder.VectorGraphicsFormat.SVG);
062        } catch (IOException e) {
063            e.printStackTrace();
064        }
065    }
066
067    public void saveChartAsPDF(File file) {
068        try {
069            VectorGraphicsEncoder.saveVectorGraphic(chart, file.getCanonicalPath(), VectorGraphicsEncoder.VectorGraphicsFormat.PDF);
070        } catch (IOException e) {
071            e.printStackTrace();
072        }
073    }
074}
